meta.article_title: March 15, 2015 - To Play the Middle and Wide Corners You Have to Practice to Them

debutant.nom: Looper goes wide with hooking sidespin
debutant.description: Looping the ball outside the corner, often with hooking sidespin to go even wider. The blocker should block the ball as wide as possible.

intermediaire.nom: Blocking at the middle with forehand or backhand
intermediaire.description: Blocking with just forehand or just backhand over and over, or moving back into a neutral position after each shot, and then reacting to the next shot with forehand or backhand.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Drill with both players going wide
exercices_complementaires.description: Looper should try looping the ball outside the corner, often with hooking sidespin to go even wider. The blocker should take the ball quick off the bounce and block it as wide as possible.
